Anix:


Anix scurried into the arc, honing in on Megatron's signal. She followed his 
route through the air vents until she reached the bridge. She looked from 
Megatron to the Preds firing at him:

"Anix, TERRORIZE!" Anix jumped out of the vent and transformed in mid-air, 
landing beside Black Aracnia. She fired her leg guns at the she-spider.
